column4: could any advise me how can i make start an application from terminal clicking its button? under gnome.
You mean you want a button in gnome that fires a terminal command?

i mean i want to run an application through terminal but just clicking on the application's icon, like it is possible in xubuntu with a right click on the application's icon and choosing 'run form a terminal'
Hm, I would create a new launcher (shortcut) and add the command there: http://www.yolinux.com/TUTORIALS/GNOME.html#LAUNCHER
